com.twitter.heron.simulator.instance

Class OutgoingTupleCollection

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.twitter.heron.simulator.instance.OutgoingTupleCollection

  • public class OutgoingTupleCollection
extends java.lang.Object
    Implements OutgoingTupleCollection will be able to handle some basic methods for send out tuples 1. initNewControlTuple or initNewDataTuple 2. addDataTuple, addAckTuple and addFailTuple 3. flushRemaining tuples and sent out the tuples

    In fact, when talking about to send out tuples, we mean we push them to the out queues.
